text: Foot Loose & Fancy Free is the eighth studio album by Rod Stewart and was released on 4 November 1977 through Warner Bros. Records. It topped the album charts in Australia, Canada, the Netherlands and New Zealand. It also went to number 2 in the United States, number 3 in the United Kingdom and number 6 in Norway and Sweden. == Track listing == == References == Category:1977 albums Category:Rod Stewart albums
title: Foot Loose & Fancy Free
